backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles, artist management with Stripe integration, product/donation CRUD with ProductType enum, platform commission settings, and includes authorization and blob storage mixins with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldActor to NewActor by adding productType field to products (defaulting to #product), renaming configuration to stripeConfiguration, and initializing checkoutSessions map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: bulk image upload, donation creation flow, marketplace filtering, store settings interface, and public artist store page with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend TypeScript/TSX files describing routing, components, pages, hooks, and their key functionality including artist dashboard, product management, Stripe integration, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Artisan Hub Marketplace', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with 11 routes (home, products, admin pages, artist pages, payment pages, store page), QueryClient, ThemeProvider, and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AdminNav.tsx: Navigation component rendering three admin links (Dashboard, Users, Revenue) with icons that hide text on smaller screens.
frontend/src/components/ArtistBenefits.t: Grid component displaying four benefit cards (Global Exposure, Secure Payments, Easy Management, Fair Artist Compensation) with icons and descriptions, avoiding specific revenue percentage mentions.
frontend/src/components/ArtistListItem.t: Displays an artist profile card with avatar, name, email, active status badge, and Stripe connection indicator. Includes a button to toggle artist activation/deactivation status with loading states and toast notifications.
Provides bulk image upload functionality for artists, allowing multiple image files to be selected, uploaded with progress tracking, and automatically converted into products. Displays upload status (pending/uploading/success/error) for each file with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/BuyNowButton.tsx: Renders a "Buy Now" button that creates a Stripe checkout session for a single product and redirects the user to the Stripe payment page. Shows loading state during checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/CommissionSettin: Admin component for viewing and updating the platform commission rate (0-100%). Displays current rate, calculates artist earnings percentage, and includes validation with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/components/DonationCard.tsx: Displays a donation product card with suggested amount, artist info, and category badge. Provides buttons for donating the suggested amount or opening a dialog to enter a custom donation amount, then creates a Stripe checkout session.
frontend/src/components/DonationForm.tsx: Dialog form for artists to create donation options with title, description, suggested amount, and category fields. Validates input and creates a donation-type product with form reset on success.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout wrapper providing header with navigation, authentication state, mobile menu, profile setup modal, and footer with social links. Conditionally renders admin/user navigation based on role and displays marketplace link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, toggling between login and logout states with loading indicators and error handling for duplicate authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with name, description, price, category badge, artist link, and a buy button in a responsive card layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog for new users to create their profile with required name and email fields plus an optional bio field, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/StoreSettingsFor: A form component for artists to customize their store settings including name, bio, banner image upload with progress tracking, and social media links for multiple platforms.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Manages Stripe payment configuration by allowing users to input their secret key and allowed countries, displaying configuration status with options to update settings.
frontend/src/components/UserNav.tsx: Navigation component with links to the artist dashboard and artist registration page, using icons and responsive text labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: A mutation hook that creates a Stripe checkout session for shopping cart items, generating success and cancel URLs based on the current window location.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor, coordinating loading states with actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API calls including user profiles, artist management, products, Stripe configuration, store settings, and social links with mutations and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page that displays Stripe payment configuration and commission settings, with role-based access control redirecting non-admins.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDashboard.tsx: Artist dashboard with tabs for managing products and donations, including CRUD operations, bulk image upload, store settings, and commission rate display.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistRegistration.ts: Artist registration form page that collects name and email, displays artist benefits, and redirects to dashboard upon successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistStorePage.tsx: Public-facing artist store page displaying banner, bio, social links, and tabbed product/donation listings filtered by artist ID.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment failure page displaying an error message with a link back to the marketplace after unsuccessful payment processing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page displaying a green checkmark icon, thank you message, and a button to continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Main marketplace page with hero banner and tabbed interface displaying products and donation options in a responsive grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/RevenueAnalytics.tsx: Admin-only revenue analytics dashboard showing total revenue, admin commission (10%), artist earnings (90%), and transaction count with placeholder data.
frontend/src/pages/UserManagement.tsx: Admin-only user management page displaying a list of registered artists with their status and management controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings, container queries, typography, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Artisan Hub Marketplace architecture with Stripe Connect integration, 90/10 revenue split, multi-photo uploads, AI descriptions, and implemented features tracking.
